text:
Hi Everyone!:wave:
I'm David, a freelance Video and Audio editor. I've been designing and editing for 4 years and freelancing for  2years now. I specialize in Motion graphics, Video Editing and audio editing, mixing and mastering. 

Niches: #Commercial Ads, #corporate videos, #Podcast edits(Audio and video), #Birthday shout outs, #YouTube Videos, and all types of video and audio content.

If you're looking for a Video or Audio editor in these niches, happy to help out! :slightly_smiling_face: You can Slack me or reach out on <https://www.linkedin.com/in/david-awobodu-7820a8166|LinkedIn>
